big_scroller.title: Make this multifunctional space that meets all your needs without breaking the bank.

big_scroller.title: These products will be out of the range soon.

big_scroller.heading: Affordable bedroom sets starting at Rs.14,999

big_scroller.title: Affordable furniture to create a space of your own

real_products.main_title: A soft cushion cover that pops up in every room
real_products.main_description: Whether you’re in need of a soft layer for your armchair, comfy support for your head when in bed or a dash of colour to your sofa, the SANELA cushion cover envelops you in equal style. Made from cotton velvet, the SANELA cushion cover can add a sense of dimension and depth to your bed or sofa arrangement, not to mention, the material is soft to the touch. Mix and match this trendy cushion cover with patterned cushions for a varied look, or keep the solid-colour theme at the forefront, since this product comes in a wide range of colours that you can chose from.

real_products.main_title: Hide your TV screen in an art gallery
real_products.main_description: A big TV is all good, but that doesn’t mean it has to become the centrepiece of the room. Or even the wall. Letting a wall-mounted monitor blend in by with framed art makes it all but go away – until it’s time for it to shine bright.

Easily finding what you need makes cooking much more enjoyable. Like with this solid aspen spice rack keeping everything you need for seasoning perfectly organised and always at hand. Any leftover space can be used for your latest cookbook purchase.

This spacious shoe cabinet has got enough drawers for everyone to keep a few pairs of shoes by the door, so you’ll always be ready for any last minute outfit changes. Combine it with a pegboard to keep keys and small items handy by the door.

cart_items.title: GAMMALBYN
cart_items.long_description: Durable metal springs in the seat give the sofa a springy comfort, allowing you to sit, relax and enjoy it for many years.

cart_items.title: ORMARYD
cart_items.long_description: Have a seat and enjoy the comfy cushion support, the soft and durable upholstery and just relax. Lovely, right? The ORMARYD series has an equally comfy 2-seat sofa and matching armchairs and footstools.

cart_items.title: GLOSTAD
cart_items.long_description: It should be easy to get a sofa and GLOSTAD sofa is easy to buy, bring home, assemble and live with. So you can enjoy more time and space to hang out with friends and family and do other important things.

cart_items.title: KLIPPAN
cart_items.long_description: We launched KLIPPAN sofa in the 1980s and it’s still a favourite. It's comfortable, fits almost everywhere and has many covers to choose from. A modern and timeless classic!

cart_items.title: GAMMALBYN
cart_items.long_description: Durable metal springs in the seat give the sofa a springy comfort, allowing you to sit, relax and enjoy it for many years.

cart_items.title: GR�NLID
cart_items.long_description: Snuggle up, feel embraced and enjoy cosy nights and lazy days with family and friends. This sofa is extra deep, has soft and moveable back cushions and can be customised to your home and your needs.

cart_items.title: HAMMARN
cart_items.long_description: This sofa quickly and easily transforms into a spacious bed for two. A tense fabric makes it nice to sit and sleep on, and its lightweight - perfect when cleaning or rearranging furniture.

cart_items.title: LYCKSELE L�V�S
cart_items.long_description: This sofa quickly and easily turns into a bed for two. Easy to keep fresh since the mattress and sofa covers can be removed and washed. Switch between several covers to give the sofa and room a new look.

cart_items.title: HEMNES
cart_items.long_description: A sofa, a single bed, a double bed and storage in one piece of furniture! Perfect if you are tight of space. If you like the style, you can combine it with other furniture in the HEMNES series.

cart_items.title: EKOLSUND
cart_items.long_description: EKOLSUND recliner has soft rounded shapes which are sized to fit in even small spaces. Adjustable in three positions – so choose whether you want to sit upright, lean back or lie back for a nap.

cart_items.title: S�DERHAMN
cart_items.long_description: A chaise longue is perfect when you want to stretch out for a while. Read a good book, watch a movie or play video games. SÖDERHAMN chaise longue can be used freestanding or in combination with your sofa.

cart_items.title: GR�NLID
cart_items.long_description: Snuggle up, feel embraced and enjoy cosy nights and lazy days with family and friends. This sofa is extra deep, has soft and moveable back cushions and can be customised to your home and your needs.

cart_items.title: FRIHETEN
cart_items.long_description: After a good night’s sleep, you can effortlessly convert your bedroom or guest room into a living room again. The built-in storage is easy to access and spacious enough to stow bedding, books and PJs.

cart_items.title: LINAN�S
cart_items.long_description: Smart transport was the goal when we created this comfy 2-seat sofa with durable beige polyester fabric. And we succeeded! It fits in a car and can follow you home right away. And the price? Low of course.

cart_items.title: ORMARYD
cart_items.long_description: Have a seat and enjoy the comfy cushion support, the soft and durable upholstery – and just relax. Lovely, right? The ORMARYD series has an equally comfy 3-seat sofa and matching armchairs and footstools.

cart_items.title: �PPLARYD
cart_items.long_description: ÄPPLARYD sofa will be your home’s comfy oasis. An eye-catcher that reflects your personality and style. Great to sit, lie down and hang out on. And with lots of space for the whole family, year after year.

cart_items.title: S�DERHAMN
cart_items.long_description: If you like the stylish airy look, you have to try the deep generous seats. Create your own personal combination of SÖDERHAMN sofa, then sit down and relax – by yourself or together with the whole family.

cart_items.title: BRIMNES
cart_items.long_description: A sofa by day and a bed for one – or two – by night. The two large drawers give plenty of space for quilts, pillows and bed linen. A smart solution when you live in a small space.

cart_items.title: SANDARED
cart_items.long_description: This soft and beautiful pouffe can be used as a footstool or extra seat. It is available in three sizes with knitted covers in different colours and patterns – perfect on their own or together!

cart_items.title: BRIMNES
cart_items.long_description: A sofa by day and a bed for one – or two – by night. The two large drawers give plenty of space for quilts, pillows and bed linen. A smart solution when you live in a small space.

cart_items.title: SANDARED
cart_items.long_description: This soft and beautiful pouffe can be used as a footstool or extra seat. It is available in three sizes with knitted covers in different colours and patterns – perfect on their own or together!

cart_items.title: FL�RT
cart_items.long_description: Convenient pocket storage for things like remote controls, glasses and magazines. Fit it over an armrest or slip it under a mattress so it hangs on the side of the bed, keeping things close at hand.

cart_items.title: GAMMALBYN
cart_items.long_description: The footstool is easy to assemble – you just screw in the legs.

cart_items.title: BRIMNES
cart_items.long_description: A sofa by day and a bed for one – or two – by night. The two large drawers give plenty of space for quilts, pillows and bed linen. A smart solution when you live in a small space.

cart_items.title: SANDARED
cart_items.long_description: This soft and beautiful pouffe can be used as a footstool or extra seat. It is available in three sizes with knitted covers in different colours and patterns – perfect on their own or together!

cart_items.title: BRIMNES
cart_items.long_description: A sofa by day and a bed for one – or two – by night. The two large drawers give plenty of space for quilts, pillows and bed linen. A smart solution when you live in a small space.

cart_items.title: FRIHETEN
cart_items.long_description: After a good night’s sleep, you can effortlessly convert your bedroom or guest room into a living room again. The built-in storage is easy to access and spacious enough to stow bedding, books and PJs.

cart_items.title: PO�NG
cart_items.long_description: POÄNG cushions have a nice feel, making your armchair ever comfier, and are available in various styles, colours and fabrics. The black Knisa cushion has a smooth texture and a characteristic stitching.

cart_items.title: EKTORP
cart_items.long_description: Our beloved EKTORP seating has a timeless design and wonderfully thick, comfy cushions. The covers are easy to change, so buy an extra cover - or two, and change according to mood or season.

cart_items.title: FYRESDAL
cart_items.long_description: Plenty of room for your guests or for long, lazy days. Use the day-bed as a free standing chaise longue, a single bed or lift and pull out the extra bed base to create a double bed.
